pullRequest.title: Add modifications to optimize user operations by reducing LDAP/DB calls
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
This PR introduces the following fixes.

Removes several unwanted LDAP calls during the user core functions.
Reduces a number of DB calls made to check user existence by leveraging the existing user ID cache.
Modifies the existing multi-attribute paginated search method of UniqueIDReadOnlyLDAPUserStoreManager to return userID.

Resolves : wso2/product-is#10627, wso2/product-is#10441
